channel.title: SilentScape PK!
channel.description:
[b]DO NOT post saying this is advertisement![/b] Note: If you have played rs before, then you have an advantage when playing my server i know you miss pking, and im gonna try to make it so we can pk again I am not trying to make this the "epic" new server nor am i trying to get noticed by anyone i just want to pk again, and how would i pk by myself?
[font=Verdana][size=20pt]===[b]S[/b]ilent[b]S[/b]cape[b]PK[/b]===[/size] [u][b]Current Features:[/b][/u] Working Smite + Skull, overhead too! Fishing, lobs swordies sharks Correct Vengeance DDS spec(not complete) Mining!(essence, rune coming soon) 90% CW with ticket exchange Working range projectiles on npcs + players Degrading crystal bow(thanks to hippie <3) Thieving, money only Shops, 1 range shop and the other 2 are for mining and fishing FULL abyss runecrafting, skulls you, and it crafts every essence no matter how many you have FULL 1v1 pking, will be edge only soon NPC training, with numerous spots working glory teles, and recharge working dh and guthans effects Our own client, with moving fire cape and about 100 new items <-- THANKS TO Dog Eats Dog <33333 Almost rs bonuses for items, so there will be accurately real hits need client to play ( so maybe no dupers ) WILL BE ADDING MORE WHEN I THINK OF EM
[u][b]Features that I promise:[/b][/u] FULL CW <333 10 waves of fight caves for fire cape ogres drop defenders maybe, close to full Pest Control( PC, duh :] ) some sort of way to distribute torsos you can run back and get your fire cape off ground full ancients full cooking mining for essence and rune working protect item, prob for whip only idk a decent economy, and if im lucky, NEVER get any dupers WILL BE ADDING MORE WHEN I THINK OF EM Ill be honest, its a little laggy atm but i can fix, i think its because i added cw ticket exchange ^which ill remove right now im cleaning out process ill either buy dedicated, which is stupid or save up for a quadcore to host myself eventually
[u][b]CW so far[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/122eps8.jpg[/img]
[u][b]Fishing[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/21eruhg.jpg[/img]
[u][b]Client Items[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/71ps92.jpg[/img]
[u][b]PC[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/2iv1b94.jpg[/img]
[u][b]Overhead smite(sorry no skull pic)[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/1z6fvvo.jpg[/img]
[u][b]Web Cutting[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2z3s4rs.jpg[/img]
Please post your thoughts
[/font]

which led to me finding out i had pc
which led to me figuring out how to fix CW
^.^

item.title: SilentScape PK!
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

DO NOT post saying this is advertisement!
Note: If you have played rs before, then you have an advantage when playing my server
i know you miss pking, and im gonna try to make it so we can pk again
I am not trying to make this the “epic” new server
nor am i trying to get noticed by anyone
i just want to pk again, and how would i pk by myself?

[font=Verdana][size=20pt]===SilentScapePK===[/size]
Current Features:
Working Smite + Skull, overhead too!
Fishing, lobs swordies sharks
Correct Vengeance
DDS spec(not complete)
Mining!(essence, rune coming soon)
90% CW with ticket exchange
Working range projectiles on npcs + players
Degrading crystal bow(thanks to hippie <3)
Thieving, money only
Shops, 1 range shop and the other 2 are for mining and fishing
FULL abyss runecrafting, skulls you, and it crafts every essence no matter how many you have
FULL 1v1 pking, will be edge only soon
NPC training, with numerous spots
working glory teles, and recharge
working dh and guthans effects
Our own client, with moving fire cape and about 100 new items <-- THANKS TO Dog Eats Dog <33333
Almost rs bonuses for items, so there will be accurately real hits
need client to play ( so maybe no dupers )
WILL BE ADDING MORE WHEN I THINK OF EM

Features that I promise:
FULL CW <333
10 waves of fight caves for fire cape
ogres drop defenders
maybe, close to full Pest Control( PC, duh :] )
some sort of way to distribute torsos
you can run back and get your fire cape off ground
full ancients
full cooking
mining for essence and rune
working protect item, prob for whip only idk
a decent economy, and if im lucky, NEVER get any dupers
WILL BE ADDING MORE WHEN I THINK OF EM
Ill be honest, its a little laggy atm
but i can fix, i think its because i added cw ticket exchange
^which ill remove
right now im cleaning out process
ill either buy dedicated, which is stupid
or save up for a quadcore to host myself
eventually

CW so far

Fishing

Client Items

PC

Overhead smite(sorry no skull pic)

Web Cutting

Please post your thoughts

[/font]
